## 2012からの定点観測データ
```{r show_data}
datatable(df, extensions = 'Buttons',
            options = list(dom = 'Blfrtip',
                           buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel'),
                           lengthMenu = list(c(10,25,50,-1),
                                             c(10,25,50,"All"))))
```


## 2017年からの報告者数
```{r}
df %>% filter(prefecture == "総数", year > 2016) %>%
  ggplot(aes(week, number, colour = as.factor(year))) +
  geom_line(aes(group = year), size = 1) +
  geom_point() + 
  gghighlight() +
  facet_grid(rows = vars(year))
```


## 2021と2022シーズンの報告者数
```{r}

df %>% filter(prefecture == "総数") %>% 
  filter(between(year, 2021, 2022)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(week, number, colour = as.factor(year))) +
  geom_line(aes(group = year), size = 1) +
  geom_point() +
  theme(
    legend.title = element_blank()
  )
```

## 2012からの報告者数
Interactive plotになっているので、拡大・縮小、年の選択等の変更が可能です。

```{r plotly}
plot_ly(df %>% filter(prefecture == "総数"), x = ~week, y = ~number, color = ~year %>% as.factor,
        type = "scatter", mode = "lines+markers", 
        colors = gg_color_hue(df$year %>% unique %>% length)) 


```
